title: Meghalaya power department signs MOU with ONGC Tripura Power Company
description: Power Minister, Shri Abu Taher Mondal, stated, â€œThis collaboration goes beyond fulfilling our energy needs; it's about crafting a legacy of responsible energy consumption and environmental stewardship. The signing of the MOU is a milestone in our commitment to harnessing Meghalaya's hydro power potential, paving the way for a greener and more sustainable future."
